EmailTemplate.subject: TurboShot|Kubernetes And Why IT Ops Should Care
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings from Turbonomic, {{lead.First Name:default=}} Here's your monthly dose of Turbonomic. Want to be featured? Let us know! <[[mailto:Murphy.Vandervelde@VMTurbo.com?Subject=Featured Customer]]> <[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-technology/kubernetes-its-past-present-and-future?utm_source=turbonomic&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=customer-newsletter&amp;utm_content=01112017]]> <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-4128?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=customer-newsletter&utm_content=01112017#whatsHappening]]> <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/videos/1264-turbonomic-top-10-features-assure-service-performance-dashboard?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=customer-newsletter&utm_content=01112017#tipsTricks]]> Featured Customer George Amols & Mary Washington Healthcare This month we are featuring a long time customer George Amols from Mary Washington Healthcare. George and team have been customers since October 2013. George is one of the most devoted customers Turbonomic has to date, finding proof of Turbonomic’s value in a number of ways. Not only has George helped his own organization by using Turbonomic but he has teamed with our engineers to pioneer new use cases so we can bring them to the general public. Read More » <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-4128?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=customer-newsletter&utm_content=01112017#featuredCustomer]]> Featured Technology Kubernetes and Why IT Ops Should Care
Kubernetes has made a splash in the IT landscape in the last few years. Container management will become an increasingly important part of the IT stack in the upcoming years and a portion of the work will fall on IT Ops' laps. Find out why IT Ops should care about Kubernetes and all that it has to offer. Read More » <[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-technology/kubernetes-its-past-present-and-future?utm_source=turbonomic&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=customer-newsletter&amp;utm_content=01112017]]>
